body:
It feels like better place for that macro will be: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/framework/register_types.h#L183

although we still need to deal with cwise ops that are registered in a specific way.

body_text:
It feels like better place for that macro will be: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/framework/register_types.h#L183
although we still need to deal with cwise ops that are registered in a specific way.
